description.p: A collection of high-stakes archetypes and forbidden probability magic.

element.name: Brand of the Dead Man's Wager

p.i: Equip this item in your inventory to activate the mark's feature on your character sheet.

element.name: Brand of the Dead Man's Wager

description.p: This brand is a Dead Man's Markerâ€”a gambling debt signed by a soul that should have departed. It manifests on the back of your hand as 20 iron chain links surrounding a sun with 8 rays. The wager is simple but terrifying: you get your life back, but the Dealer holds an unspecified favor to be called in at their discretion.

ul.li: Active Phase (Hours 1-8): You gain +2 AC. The sun glows, but one ray extinguishes every hour.
Burden Phase (Hours 9-20): The sun is dark. You lose the AC bonus. You cannot Long Rest until the 20th hour passes.

description.p: During the Burden Phase, the odds turn against you. For every hour that passes after the 8th, roll a d20. If you roll a 1, the Dealer collects interest on the debt.
If triggered, roll a d8 on the Corruption Table below:

tr.td: Singed Nerves: The chains heat up violently. You take 1d4 fire damage that cannot be reduced.
Phantom Weight: Your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 hour.
Creaking Joints: Your movements echo with the sound of grinding metal. Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks for 1 hour.
Spectral Whispers: The debt collectors are watching. Disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks for 1 hour.
Lead Arm: The mark feels impossibly heavy. You have Disadvantage on Strength Ability Checks and Saving Throws for 1 hour.
Metabolic Tax: The mark siphons your vitality. Your Hit Point Maximum is reduced by 1d6 + your level until you finish a Long Rest.
Feverish Haze: The pain clouds your judgment. You have Disadvantage on Intelligence and Charisma Ability Checks for 1 hour.
Grace Period: The burning stops and the chains fade early. The cooldown ends immediately. You may begin a Long Rest now if you wish.

sheet.description: +2 AC for 8 hours. Afterwards, AC bonus is lost. Each hour past 8, roll a d20; on a 1, trigger a Corruption effect. Cannot rest until Hour 20 unless a Grace Period (Roll 8) occurs.
